thread.title: In Turkey's Kurdish Towns, Bullets Fly Before Ballots

title: In Turkey's Kurdish Towns, Bullets Fly Before Ballots
text:
Published By: Wall Street Journal - Today 
The conflict in Kurdish areas is spinning out of control just as Turkey prepares for elections on Nov. 1....
